components.simplesoccer.model

Class OmnidirectionalPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • components.simplesoccer.model.NearestInfoPlayer
      • components.simplesoccer.model.OmnidirectionalPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller

    public class OmnidirectionalPlayer
extends NearestInfoPlayer
    The controller of a player, basically this class contains the behavior of the soccer player controlled by the passed representation component. The player will make decision based on all players, distance to goal, distance to ball.
